articles.title: Leonardo DiCaprio, Vittoria Ceretti Go For Romantic Bike Ride in New York City - TMZ
articles.description: Leonardo DiCaprio and Vittoria Ceretti are sticking to popular European transport back stateside ... riding bikes through the Big Apple and hanging with a member of Leo's fam.
